meanings.definition: The act of arranging in a pattern resembling a parquet floor.
meanings.sent1: The parqueting of the tiles in the hallway created a beautiful design.
meanings.sent2: The parqueting of the room added elegance to the interior.
meanings.sent3: The parqueting of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her parqueting of words in the poem created a rhythmic flow.
meanings.sent5: The parqueting of colors in the painting was visually striking.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with a parquet floor.
meanings.sent1: They were parqueting the ballroom for the grand event.
meanings.sent2: She decided to parquet the living room for a classic look.
meanings.sent3: He was parqueting the cake with intricate designs.
meanings.sent4: The artist was parqueting the canvas with different textures.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter was parqueting the stage for the performance.

meanings.definition: A patterned floor made of small wooden blocks.
meanings.sent1: The old mansion had a beautiful parqueting throughout.
meanings.sent2: The museum's parqueting was well-maintained and stunning.
meanings.sent3: The parqueting on the playground made hopscotch more fun.
meanings.sent4: The parqueting on the ship's deck added a touch of luxury.
meanings.sent5: The parqueting in the library gave it a warm and inviting feel.
